mn7:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn7:2.2: tamenam rajako yasmim yasmim rangajate upasamhareyya—yadi nilakaya yadi pitakaya yadi lohitakaya yadi manjitthakaya durattavannamevassa aparisuddhavannamevassa.
mn7:2.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, citte sankilitthe, duggati patikankha.
mn7:2.7: tamenam rajako yasmim yasmim rangajate upasamhareyya—yadi nilakaya yadi pitakaya yadi lohitakaya yadi manjitthakaya—surattavannamevassa parisuddhavannamevassa.
mn7:2.10: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, citte asankilitthe, sugati patikankha.
mn7:3.2: Abhijjhavisamalobho cittassa upakkileso, byapado cittassa upakkileso, kodho cittassa upakkileso, upanaho cittassa upakkileso, makkho cittassa upakkileso, palaso cittassa upakkileso, issa cittassa upakkileso, macchariyam cittassa upakkileso, maya cittassa upakkileso, satheyyam cittassa upakkileso, thambho cittassa upakkileso, sarambho cittassa upakkileso, mano cittassa upakkileso, atimano cittassa upakkileso, mado cittassa upakkileso, pamado cittassa upakkileso.
mn7:4.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘abhijjhavisamalobho cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva abhijjhavisamalobham cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.3: iti viditva byapadam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.5: iti viditva kodham cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.7: iti viditva upanaham cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.9: iti viditva makkham cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.11: iti viditva palasam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.13: iti viditva issam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.15: iti viditva macchariyam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.17: iti viditva mayam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.19: iti viditva satheyyam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.21: iti viditva thambham cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.23: iti viditva sarambham cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.25: iti viditva manam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.27: iti viditva atimanam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.29: iti viditva madam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati;
mn7:4.31: iti viditva pamadam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati.
mn7:5.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘abhijjhavisamalobho cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva abhijjhavisamalobho cittassa upakkileso pahino hoti,
mn7:5.3: iti viditva byapado cittassa upakkileso pahino hoti;

mn7:5.33: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti;
mn7:6.2: ‘svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi’ti;
mn7:7.2: ‘suppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, ujuppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, nayappatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, samicippatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, yadidam cattari purisayugani, attha purisapuggala. Esa bhagavato savakasangho ahuneyyo pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo, anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa’ti.
mn7:8.1: Yathodhi kho panassa cattam hoti vantam muttam pahinam patinissattham, so ‘buddhe aveccappasadena samannagatomhi’ti labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam.
mn7:8.2: Pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vedeti, sukhino cittam samadhiyati;
mn7:10.1: sanghe aveccappasadena samannagatomhi’ti labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam;
mn7:10.2: pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vedeti, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
mn7:11.1: ‘Yathodhi kho pana me cattam vantam muttam pahinam patinissatthan’ti labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam;
mn7:11.2: pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vedeti, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
mn7:12.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evamsilo evamdhammo evampanno salinancepi pindapatam bhunjati vicitakalakam anekasupam anekabyanjanam, nevassa tam hoti antarayaya.
mn7:12.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, vattham sankilittham malaggahitam acchodakam agamma parisuddham hoti pariyodatam, ukkamukham va panagamma jatarupam parisuddham hoti pariyodatam;
mn7:12.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evamsilo evamdhammo evampanno salinancepi pindapatam bhunjati vicitakalakam anekasupam anekabyanjanam, nevassa tam hoti antarayaya.
mn7:13.1: So mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena pharitva viharati;
mn7:16.1: upekkhasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam upekkhasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena pharitva viharati.
mn7:17.1: So ‘atthi idam, atthi hinam, atthi panitam, atthi imassa sannagatassa uttari nissaranan’ti pajanati.
mn7:18.1: Tassa evam janato evam passato kamasavapi cittam vimuccati, bhavasavapi cittam vimuccati, avijjasavapi cittam vimuccati.
mn7:18.3: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
mn7:19.1: Tena kho pana samayena sundarikabharadvajo brahmano bhagavato avidure nisinno hoti.
mn7:19.2: Atha kho sundarikabharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn7:19.3: “gacchati pana bhavam gotamo bahukam nadim sinayitun”ti?
mn7:19.6: “Lokkhasammata hi, bho gotama, bahuka nadi bahujanassa, punnasammata hi, bho gotama, bahuka nadi bahujanassa, bahukaya pana nadiya bahujano papakammam katam pavaheti”ti.
mn7:20.1: Atha kho bhagava sundarikabharadvajam brahmanam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
mn7:21.1: Evam vutte, sundarikabharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn7:21.3: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya—cakkhumanto rupani dakkhantiti; evamevam bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
mn7:21.4: Esaham bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
mn7:21.5: Labheyyaham bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjam, labheyyam upasampadan”ti.
mn7:22.1: Alattha kho sundarikabharadvajo brahmano bhagavato santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
mn7:22.2: Acirupasampanno kho panayasma bharadvajo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
mn7:22.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
mn7:22.4: Annataro kho panayasma bharadvajo arahatam ahositi.
